post.body: You bet! I'm on it!
I just heard a snowplow!!! The spoons are working!
I'm getting a Kindle for Christmas...I'll add it to my Wish List!
What book are you guys talking about? You've got me interested!
@theresagray Is there a heart rate monitor that u guys recommend? How about that one on the 24 hr fitness page w/ the Body Bugg?
Oh! I'm finding her to be a bit over the top tonight, then I wondered if she was just reading from a teleprompter that was off
My cycling instructor is really encouraging the heart rate monitor
Do you have one?
She's driving me nuts! @datadiva pointed out how annoying she is tonight and I'm stuck on it
That's good...you want it to kick in to high gear about 2:30am...I've got nothing :(
Don't they cost a fortune?
Do you have one of those armband things that they wear on TBL?
Just found it...thank you!
Sure is! Thank you!
OK...just "favorited" you!
I should have known! Darn it! Just checked out your Christmas pics...looks like Santa dumped entire sleigh at Fisherland!
"locked"...you couldn't print it
Twilight book I was trying 2 read was only as pdf on-line & was locked, so couldn't print it..major PITA! Rather read on Kindle!
No scholarly reading yet! :)
we are reading @jimknight99's book...and thinking of a virtual bookclub...want to join? http://tinyurl.com/6sjf2q
OMG! That is a real dent! Poor Kate!
I'm at my parents' where the computer is in a room that only gets 5 channels...I could use a little entertainment, please?
Come on...Twitterland is dying to know how it's going in Fisher Oz w/ 2 Dorothys in the same place at the same time.no twitpics?
I'm serious! We would have a blast! And it's the perfect time of year for a bookstudy!
Can I get in on the bookstudy on Jim's book? :) That's an awesome idea to do a virtual bookclub!
Sounds fantabulous! We can even hit up Macaroni Grill :)
Isn't it nice knowing that you have access to the outside world when u have twitter at work?
Ugh!
Is it still snowing there?
@fisher1000 Do you guys go back to work tomorrow? Or is there enough snow to keep you home for one more day?
TBL...next season looks great! So does next season of Real World...gonna be a fun January! :)
TBL-wish they would do an update on past participants..saw that mom/son couple from last season in the front row...let them get on the scale
Does anyone know how to change your password in Gmail? Just read Lifehacker post on Gmail getting hacked
TBL question...do u get paid to be on TBL? How do couples BOTH go on the show and leave their lives for at least 3 months?
TBL update...LOVE Amy C!
Downloaded Twilight from Edward's perspective to the Kindle...so much easier than reading on-line! http://tinyurl.com/68ucxp
Got a kindle for Christmas! LOVE it! http://tinyurl.com/58k4q5=/ref=cm_cd_t_pb_t
Our electricity went out :(
95 Old School games you can play online...http://tinyurl.com/7f938m
Causing a lot of trouble with Elf Yourself...http://elfyourself.jibjab.com/ :)
